title: Book of Summonings
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

| Type | Book               |
| :--- | ------------------ |
| Name | Book of Summonings |

|   |                                                                                                                         |
| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | An advanced treatise on Summoning magics, detailing ways of summoning and binding creatures from all manners of realms. |

## Spells

| Tile                                                                                        | Spell                                               | Type                                                                                | Level |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----- |
| [![Summon demon.png](/images/c/c5/Summon_demon.png)](/File:Summon_demon.png)                | a - [Summon Demon](/Summon_Demon "Summon Demon")    | [Summoning](/Summoning "Summoning")                                                 | 5     |
| [![Summon forest.png](/images/6/6a/Summon_forest.png)](/File:Summon_forest.png)             | b - [Summon Forest](/Summon_Forest "Summon Forest") | [Summoning](/Summoning "Summoning")/[Translocation](/Translocation "Translocation") | 5     |
| [![Summon mana viper.png](/images/5/53/Summon_mana_viper.png)](/File:Summon_mana_viper.png) | c - [Statue Form](/Statue_Form "Statue Form")       | [Hexes](/Hexes "Hexes")/[Summoning](/Summoning "Summoning")                         | 5     |
| [![Shadow creatures.png](/images/1/19/Shadow_creatures.png)](/File:Shadow_creatures.png)    | d - [Statue Form](/Statue_Form "Statue Form")       | [Summoning](/Summoning "Summoning")                                                 | 6     |
| [![Summon hydra.png](/images/1/1c/Summon_hydra.png)](/File:Summon_hydra.png)                | e - [Statue Form](/Statue_Form "Statue Form")       | [Summoning](/Summoning "Summoning")                                                 | 7     |

## History

- In [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), this book was replaced with the Book of Dryads ([Summon Forest](/Summon_Forest "Summon Forest"), [Summon Mana Viper](/Summon_Mana_Viper "Summon Mana Viper"), and [Shadow Creatures](/Shadow_Creatures "Shadow Creatures")). [Summon Demon](/Summon_Demon "Summon Demon") became a monster-only spell, and [Summon Hydra](/Summon_Hydra "Summon Hydra") was moved into other books.
- In [0.26](/0.26 "0.26"), [Aura of Abjuration](/Aura_of_Abjuration "Aura of Abjuration") and [Recall](/Recall "Recall") were removed. [Summon Hydra](/Summon_Hydra "Summon Hydra") was moved from the [Book of Beasts](/Book_of_Beasts "Book of Beasts") into this book.
- In [0.17](/0.17 "0.17"), [Abjuration](/Abjuration "Abjuration") (L3) was replaced by [Aura of Abjuration](/Aura_of_Abjuration "Aura of Abjuration") (L5) and [Monstrous Menagerie](/Monstrous_Menagerie "Monstrous Menagerie") by [Summon Mana Viper](/Summon_Mana_Viper "Summon Mana Viper").
- In [0.15](/0.15 "0.15"), the book lost [Summon Elemental](/Summon_Elemental "Summon Elemental") as part of the spell's removal. [Summon Forest](/Summon_Forest "Summon Forest") was moved over from the [Book of the Warp](/Book_of_the_Warp "Book of the Warp") to replace it.
- In [0.14](/0.14 "0.14"), the book lost [Summon Ugly Thing](/Summon_Ugly_Thing "Summon Ugly Thing") as part of that spell's removal, and gained Monstrous Menagerie as part of that spell's addition.
- Prior to [0.8](/0.8 "0.8"), the book had [Haunt](/Haunt "Haunt") and [Summon Horrible Things](/Summon_Horrible_Things "Summon Horrible Things") but not Summon Demon, which in 0.8 were exchanged over from the [Grand Grimoire](/Grand_Grimoire "Grand Grimoire"). 0.8 itself added Summon Elemental to the book.
- Prior to [0.7](/0.7 "0.7"), the book contained [Call Canine Familiar](/Call_Canine_Familiar "Call Canine Familiar"). The spell was moved over to the [Book of Callings](/Book_of_Callings "Book of Callings"), replacing said book's Summon Elemental slot.
html:
Book of Summonings

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
Type Book
Name Book of Summonings
An advanced treatise on Summoning magics, detailing ways of summoning and binding creatures from all manners of realms.

Spells

Tile Spell Type Level
a - Summon Demon Summoning 5
b - Summon Forest Summoning/Translocation 5
c - Statue Form Hexes/Summoning 5
d - Statue Form Summoning 6
e - Statue Form Summoning 7

History

  • In 0.27, this book was replaced with the Book of Dryads (Summon Forest, Summon Mana Viper, and Shadow Creatures). Summon Demon became a monster-only spell, and Summon Hydra was moved into other books.
  • In 0.26, Aura of Abjuration and Recall were removed. Summon Hydra was moved from the Book of Beasts into this book.
  • In 0.17, Abjuration (L3) was replaced by Aura of Abjuration (L5) and Monstrous Menagerie by Summon Mana Viper.
  • In 0.15, the book lost Summon Elemental as part of the spell's removal. Summon Forest was moved over from the Book of the Warp to replace it.
  • In 0.14, the book lost Summon Ugly Thing as part of that spell's removal, and gained Monstrous Menagerie as part of that spell's addition.
  • Prior to 0.8, the book had Haunt and Summon Horrible Things but not Summon Demon, which in 0.8 were exchanged over from the Grand Grimoire. 0.8 itself added Summon Elemental to the book.
  • Prior to 0.7, the book contained Call Canine Familiar. The spell was moved over to the Book of Callings, replacing said book's Summon Elemental slot.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Book_of_Summonings&oldid=58399"

==History==
*In [[0.27]], this book was replaced with the Book of Dryads ([[Summon Forest]], [[Summon Mana Viper]], and [[Shadow Creatures]]). [[Summon Demon]] became a monster-only spell, and [[Summon Hydra]] was moved into other books.
*In [[0.26]], [[Aura of Abjuration]] and [[Recall]] were removed. [[Summon Hydra]] was moved from the [[Book of Beasts]] into this book. 
*In [[0.17]], [[Abjuration]] (L3) was replaced by [[Aura of Abjuration]] (L5) and [[Monstrous Menagerie]] by [[Summon Mana Viper]].
*In [[0.15]], the book lost [[Summon Elemental]] as part of the spell's removal. [[Summon Forest]] was moved over from the [[Book of the Warp]] to replace it.
*In [[0.14]], the book lost [[Summon Ugly Thing]] as part of that spell's removal, and gained Monstrous Menagerie as part of that spell's addition.
*Prior to [[0.8]], the book had [[Haunt]] and [[Summon Horrible Things]] but not Summon Demon, which in 0.8 were exchanged over from the [[Grand Grimoire]]. 0.8 itself added Summon Elemental to the book.
*Prior to [[0.7]], the book contained [[Call Canine Familiar]]. The spell was moved over to the [[Book of Callings]], replacing said book's Summon Elemental slot.
